core.name: Shining Like Gold
core.description: Team Lightning DMG +20.0%. Team Total DMG +22.0%.

subskills.name: Shining Like Gold
subskills.description: Team Lightning DMG +20.0%. Team Total DMG +22.0%.

core.name: Combo Attack-Romance: Paradise
core.description:
Hold ATK button to unleash various Combo ATKs based on [Musical Score]
[Chord]: Shoots rapidly, dealing 5x130% ATK of Lightning Element DMG and gains [Playing] status.
[Variation]: Throw a note bomb, dealing 400% ATK of Lightning Element DMG and provides [Enchanted] status to all characters.
[Doubling]: Throw pistols, circling 2 times, dealing 200% + 6 x 80% ATK of Lightning DMG and consuming 6 Notes during the first circling, and dealing 6 x 25% ATK of Lightning Elemeng DMG during the second circling. After using, gains [Music Surrounding] and [Playing] status, and provides [Enchanted] status to all characters. During the second circling, the pistols can be retrieved by releasing ATK button.
During [Chord] and [Variation], gains Iron Body and 30% Total DMG Reduction. During [Doubling], the character won't take any damage from enemies.

subskills.name: The 1st Movement: Lamplight
subskills.description: [Playing] status lasts 8s(can be refreshed). During the status, dealing DMG will cause the targets to take 30.0% more Lightning Element DMG for 20s(can be refreshed, independent effect).

subskills.name: The 2nd Movement: Thriving City
subskills.description: [Enchanted] status lasts 20s(can be refreshed). During the status, Total DMG +40.0%.

subskills.name: The 3rd Movement: Beautiful Night
subskills.description: [Music Surrounding] status lasts 8s(can be refreshed). During the status, every Normal ATK and Combo ATK dealing damage additionally unleashes a note attack, dealing 30.0% ATK of Lightning Element DMG. This attack can be triggered once every 0.3s. [Doubling] inflicts 12 x 0.25 Paralyze Trauma.

core.name: Requiem: Memory
core.description: [Musical Score] Divided into two measures. Each measure can have 3 notes, each Normal ATK restores 1 Note. When Notes are maxed out, you can use Combo ATK([Chord], [Variation]) and complete one measure. After completing two measures, you can use next Combo ATK([Doubling]) and consume all Notes, and recover 100 HP for each note consumed.

subskills.name: The 1st Movement: Old Days
subskills.description: After Golden Diva exits, duration of [Enchanted] state of all characters in the battlefield are refreshed.

subskills.name: The 2nd Movment: Stars
subskills.description: Initial SP +40.0(can be triggered every 10 mins in the open world).

subskills.name: The 3rd Movment: An Epoch
subskills.description: When the team inflicts paralyze against an enemy, Total DMG 20.0% for 10s.

core.name: Fantasia: Ode To The World
core.description:
Play [Ode to the World], dealing 1800% ATK of Lightning Element DMG to enemies within the range, inflicting 12 Paralyze Trauma, and obtaining [Sound of Heaven] buff to herself which lasts for 15s. During the ult casting, the character won't take any damage from enemies. When obtaining [Sound of Heaven], immediately restores all notes and complete all measures. During the buff, Notes continously restores and you can unleash Combo ATKs, [Doubling], [Chord], [Variation] by tapping ATK button. Also [Doubling] circles only once. When the buff ends, clears all Notes.
SP: 125, CD: 17s.

subskills.name: The 1st Movement: Pastorale
subskills.description: After playing [Ode to the World], all characters on the battlefield restore 2.0 SP every second for 8.0s second.

subskills.name: The 2nd Movement: Gunsmoke
subskills.description: During [Sound of Heaven], self Lightning Element DMG of Combo ATKs +20.0%.

subskills.name: The 3rd Movement: Epigraphy
subskills.description: When hitting a Nihilus Seed, Ultimate instantly depletes its current-phase HP if it's below 20%.

core.name: Waltz: Drunken Dreams
core.description:
Quickly evades enemy attack. Can be performed twice in a row.
Ultimate Evasion: Inflicts 3.0s of Time Fracture. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: The 1st Movement: Sweet Dew
subskills.description: After using Ultimate Evasion, restores all notes of curent measure. Hold ATK button to release corresponding Combo ATK directly.

subskills.name: The 2nd Movement: Delight
subskills.description: While the character is standby, restores 5 SP per second if her current SP is below 100.0.

core.name: Capriccio: Starlight
core.description:
1th SEQ: 90% ATK of Lightning Element DMG.
2nd SEQ: 100% ATK of Lightning Element DMG.
3rd SEQ: 120% ATK of Lightning Element DMG.
Each Normal ATK restores 1 Note.

subskills.name: The 1st Movement: Nightfall
subskills.description: When 3rd SEQ hits an enemy, self Lightning Element DMG +30.0% for 3s.

subskills.name: QTE-The 2nd Movement: Enlightenment
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is time-slowed or a teammate uses Weapon Active Skill, inflicting 3s of global Time Fracture, dealing 1500.0% + 2 x 50% ATK of Lightning Element DMG, restores 12 SP, completes the first measure, and obtaining [Playing] Status. QTE entry reduces the CD of the next switch by 4.0s.

core.name: Peerless Singing Voice
core.description: During [Doubling], releasing ATK button when a flash appears on the body activates [Grand Ensemble]. [Grand Ensemble] deals 500% ATK of Lightning Element DMG and accumulates 3.5 Paralyze Trauma. During [Grand Ensemble], the character won't take any damages. In [Sound of Heaven] status, [Grand Ensemble] is released automatically.

subskills.name: Like The Sound Of Heaven Above Clouds
subskills.description: When [Grand Ensemble] hits an enemy, Golden Diva recovers 2.5 SP and 100.0 HP.

subskills.name: Like A Clear Stream Of A Lake
subskills.description: When [Grand Ensemble] hits an enemy, restores 8.0 SP to all team members. CD: 8s. After using Ult, the first [Grand Ensemble] before exiting triggers 3s of Time Fracture.

subskills.name: Like A Bright Star In The Night
subskills.description: After using Ult, enhance Golden Diva's Combo ATKs. Paralyze Trauma accumlation rate of the attacks are increased by 25.0% for 10s. Self Total DMG of the attacks are increased by 25.0% for 15s.
